Pet Manager Woods: Kaiser! Come here... So... good boy! Oh, hello? Yes, that's right... Isn't it so cute? It is the pure-bred black-striped Alpen Kuger. It is originally a violent beast, but you can raise it to become gentle like this if you trained it since it was a baby. You just need to remember feeding it on time.
